fields.desc: ObjectID of the commit at which the clone was detected
ObjectID of the file in which the clone was detected
Class to which the clone belongs. All clones in one class are copies of each other (at a certain commit!)
Line at which the clone starts
Line at which the clone ends
Column at which the clone starts
Column at which the clone ends
Metrics for the clone at hand
Metrics for the clone class to which this clone belongs

collections.desc: Collection that contains information about different clones detected in the files of a project

fields.desc: long name of the code entity (e.g., file path or class name or method name with arguments
ObjectID of the commit to which this specific state is related to
ObjectID of the file to which this specific state is related to
ObjectID of the parent entity state to which this state relates to (e.g. a method state has a class state as parent)
List of ObjectIds of code group states that are related to the entity state (e.g., a class state has a package state)
List of linter warnings. Including ln (line number), message (msg), and type of warning (l_ty)
Abstraction level of the entity (e.g., class, attribute, enum, interface, method, function, annotation, module)
Line in which the entity starts in the specified file (e.g., start of the method)
Line in which the entity ends in the specified file (e.g. end of the method)
Column in which the entity starts in the specified file
Column in which the entity ends in the specified file
Metrics of the code entity. See user guides at: https://www.sourcemeter.com/resources/

collections.desc: Collection that contains for each commit of the project all code entity states (e.g., all methods of the project at each commit)

fields.desc: Name of the code group (e.g., de.shark.package1 for packages)
ObjectID that relates to the commit to which this state belongs
List of ObjectIDs of code group states that are parents of this state (e.g., de.shark is a parent of de.shark.package1)
Code group type. E.g., Package or Component
Metrics of the code group state. See user guides at: https://www.sourcemeter.com/resources/
Line at which the code group starts (if available)
Line at which the code group ends (if available)
Column at which the code group starts (if available)
Column at which the code group ends (if available)

collections.desc: Collection that contains for each commit of the project all code group states (e.g., all packages of the project at each commit)
